info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment:
My recent stay at Greyroom was nothing short of magical! From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with warm hospitality and a beautifully curated space that exceeded all expectations.
The communication was seamless, with prompt responses and helpful tips about the local area. It truly felt like they were dedicated to making my stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible.
The property itself was a hidden gem – a cozy haven that struck the perfect balance between modern amenities and a homey atmosphere. The attention to detail in the interior design was remarkable, creating a welcoming ambiance that made me feel right at home. The cleanliness was impeccable, and the well-appointed furnishings added a touch of luxury to the overall experience
The location was also ideal, with convenient access to renowned private universities NSU, IUB Whether I wanted to explore the local culture or simply unwind in a peaceful setting, Greyroom offered the perfect combination of both.
